body: i'm thankful that last night i wondered whether a hip hop song had ever sampled the theme to _welcome back kotter_ and i'm thankful that i found this old mase song ([spotify](https://open.spotify.com/track/70khXICDeTTxgYtw3EysKH?si=U-El9MiZSe-dMQPawOYRqg), [yt](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vNey0PR46F4)), which is back to front joy, strutty piano comping, izzo hova string streaks, not one or two but three different flavors of interpolation (the last one a children's choir). i'm thankful that "it feels good to hear people singing welcome back" and i 'm thankful to recommend it if you need a pick me up (and don't we all, always).
